output_list.description: The mintToken function has an integer overflow in the calculation of the minted amount, allowing unauthorized minting of tokens.
Integer overflow in the calculation of the sender's balance, allowing unauthorized transfers.
Integer overflow in the calculation of the winner's balance, allowing unauthorized minting of tokens.
Integer overflow in the calculation of the owner's balance, allowing unauthorized reinitialization of the contract.
Integer overflow in the calculation of the minted amount, allowing unauthorized minting of tokens.
Integer overflow in the calculation of the winner's balance, allowing unauthorized minting of tokens.
